string-array.name: questions
string-array.item: The Earth was formed about _____ years ago.
Dinosaurs and many other species were extinct about _____ years ago.
The deepest hole in the Earth, ‘Kola Superdeep Borehole’ on Russia’s Kola Peninsula, is about _____ feet deep.
Which country is building “Mars Science City” to develop technology to colonize Mars?
The stock of “Amonium Nitrate” which was resulted in large explosion in Lebanon is a _____ chemical compound.
There are 7 continents in the world. The total area of these 7 continents is about
The Panama Canal in Panama is a man-made 77 km waterway that connects
Islands which measure less than one acre (or less than 4046.86 meter square) are often referred to as
The Pico Island is located in
Sultan Ahmed Mosque in Istanbul is popularly known as the
The Great Pyramid of Giza, the oldest of the ancient 7 wonders of the world, is located in
Lake Lucerne that has complicated shape with several sharp bends and four arms is located in
Which city is also called The City of 1,000 Minarets
The South Pole of the Earth is located in
The North Pole of the Earth is located in
